Documentation

Learn how to build a website with boba!

Labels

Labels come in all colors
Default Red Orange Yellow Green Teal Blue Indigo Purple Pink 
<span class="label green"> Green </span>

Sizes

Labels can be resized
Small Default Medium Large 
<span class="label green"> Green </span>

Styles

Change the look of your buttons with ease

Rounded

Labels can be pill-shaped
Default Red Orange Yellow Green Teal Blue Indigo Purple Pink 
<span class="label green rounded"> Green </span>

Outlined

Your labels will be colored outlines
Default Red Orange Yellow Green Teal Blue Indigo Purple Pink 
<span class="label green outlined"> Green </span>

Combinations

Use .rounded with .outlined to create the perfect label
Red Green 
<span class="label red rounded outlined"> Red </span>
<span class="label green rounded outlined"> Red </span>

Join Labels

Combine multiple labels using the .join-labels class
build with boba
build with boba 
<div class="join-labels">
	<span class="label outlined">build</span>
	<span class="label blue">with</span>
	<span class="label orange">boba</span>
</div>

<div class="join-labels">
	<span class="label rounded outlined">build</span>
	<span class="label blue">with</span>
	<span class="label orange rounded">boba</span>
</div>

Label Groups

Keep multiple labels grouped and equally spaced using the .label-group class
Single Label
Double Label
build with boba 
<div class="label-group">
	<span class="label pink">Single Label</span>
	<div class="join-labels">
		<span class="label purple">Double</span>
		<span class="label purple outlined">Label</span>
	</div>
	<div class="join-labels">
		<span class="label">build</span>
		<span class="label blue">with</span>
		<span class="label orange">boba</span>
	</div>
</div>
